title: IS there still a way?
body:
To spectate featured matches? Like how you used to see the ranked matched in the bottom right of the client? Then you could just go watch it.

Now the only way i see to spectate matches is to go to custom games and watch people play bot matches 90% of the time, How do i spectate matches the old way?

replies.body: *Featured Matches* were removed from the client a while ago. Outside of spectating friends or players in custom matches, there are no other ways to spectate other players. I don't know if or when this feature is coming back but let me know if you have any other questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=HadPrUjz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-24T18:00:24.135+0000)
>
> *Featured Matches* were removed from the client a while ago. Outside of spectating friends or players in custom matches, there are no other ways to spectate other players. I don't know if or when this feature is coming back but let me know if you have any other questions.

Mkay, thank you for the response, you guys should bring it back! i like to eat food and watch someone elses match before i play my own xD
